    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="ca">Comsoc: Laboratori de filosofia</string>
            <string language="en">Comsoc: Philosophy laboratory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Comsoc: Philosophielabor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comsoc : Laboratoire de philosophie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comsoc: Laboratório da filosofia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comsoc: Laboratorio di filosofia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Comsoc: Εργαστήριο φιλοσοφίας</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Selecció de recursos de Filosofia distribuïts en tres apartats: 
- Glossari: entrades de temes de filosofia,
- Personatges: biografies de personatges rellevants al llarg de la història de la filosofia,
- Vincles: enllaços a pàgines de filosofia.</string>
            <string language="en">Selection of resources for philosophy in three sections:  Glossary of philosophical issues;  Biographies of outstanding people in the history of philosophy;  Links to webpages on philosophy.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">biografia</string>
            <string language="en">biography</string>
            <string language="es">biografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">epistemologia</string>
            <string language="en">epistemology</string>
            <string language="es">epistemología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ètica</string>
            <string language="en">ethics</string>
            <string language="es">ética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lògica</string>
            <string language="en">logic</string>
            <string language="es">lógica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">filosofia</string>
            <string language="en">philosophy</string>
            <string language="es">filosofía</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswahl der Betriebsmittel für Philosophie in 
drei Kapiteln: - Glossar der philosophischen Ausgaben; - 
Biographien der hervorragenden Leute in der Geschichte der 
Philosophie; - Links zu den Webseiten auf Philosophie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sélection des ressources pour la philosophie 
dans trois sections : - glossaire des issues philosophiques ; 
- biographies des personnes exceptionnelles dans l'histoire de 
la philosophie ; - liens aux pages Web sur la philosophie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seleção dos recursos para a filosofia em três 
seções: - glossário de edições filosóficas; - 
biografias de povos proeminentes no history da filosofia; - 
ligações aos Web pages na filosofia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Selezione delle risorse per filosofia in tre 
sezioni: - glossario delle edizioni filosofiche; - 
biografie della gente eccezionale nella storia di filosofia; - 
collegamenti ai Web pagi su filosofia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιλογή των στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς για τη φιλοσοφία σε
τρία τμήματα: - Γλωσσάρι των φιλοσοφικών ζητημάτων  -
Βιογραφίες των σημαντικών ανθρώπων στην ιστορία της φιλοσοφίας  
- Συνδέσεις με τα webpages στη φιλοσοφία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biographie</string>
          </keyword>
